channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Accordion Image Menu
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Accordion Image Menu

item.title: CVE-2024-8092|2024-09-17T06:00:06.467Z -- unknown -- accordion%20image%20menu
item.description: The Accordion Image Menu WordPress plugin through 3.1.3 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack.
